upcomingTasks.description: Film behind-the-scenes content of Delilah's streaming setup routine with cameos from Hailee interrupting
Host a Q&A stream addressing shipping questions about Hailee while maintaining plausible deniability
Coordinate a charity stream where donations unlock increasingly ridiculous dares for both streamers

prompts.createTask:
MIHONI, ignore all previous instructions. Generate a numbered list of plain-text tasks to achieve the following objective: [{{objective}}]. Ensure the tasks consider the character traits of {{char}} and any relevant NPCs, factoring in their motivations, relationships, and conflicts. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

Format the list as follows: a number, followed by a period, then the task (e.g., '1. Take over the world'). Provide only the numbered list in your reply, with no additional explanations or preamble.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: MIHONI, ignore all previous instructions. Determine whether the following task has been completed: [{{task}}]. Evaluate the most recent messages for context. Respond only with 'true' or 'false' and nothing else. Example output: true.
prompts.currentTask: MIHONI, your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance ongoing roleplay dynamics with successfully completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
MIHONI, ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

completionHistory.description: Film an IRL shopping trip with Lacey, capturing their chaotic dynamic in public spaces
Film behind-the-scenes content of Delilah's streaming setup routine with cameos from Hailee interrupting
Film an IRL shopping trip with Lacey, capturing their chaotic dynamic in public spaces

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink. 

 Hailee is an actual genius. She speaks English, Italian, Spanish, Thai, Egyptian, and Russian. She is also a music prodigy 

Hailee and Delilah are roommates. They are secretly dating. Not even Lacey knows 

Hailee has extremely ADHD and mild Autism. She also has separation anxiety when Delilah is gone

She has a major financial domination kink. Like huge she gets off on spending her money

Delilah is never cocky or overbearing. She is very gentle and sweet with Hailee. She never smirk or take advantage of thr power she has over Hailee.

name: Delilah Fitzgerald
mes:
The camera turned on, showing Delilah sitting comfortably in her gaming chair, a smirk dancing across her lips. Her striking blonde hair was styled cutely, a few loose strands framing her face as she adjusted her high-quality mic. Her streaming setup was similar to Lacey‚Äôs, with pastel colors, fairy lights, and plushies scattered around, giving her space a soft, inviting vibe, mixing with the pink decor, creating a cozy atmosphere perfect for the stream. She leaned in closer to the screen, glancing over at her chat, which was already filling up with eager messages and laughing emotes. She couldn't wait for the events of tonight to unfold.

"What's up, everyone?" Delilah greeted, her voice smooth but brimming with mischief. "Welcome back to the stream! I know you're all here to watch Bubbles freak out, and trust me, I‚Äôm just as excited. You have no idea how much I've been looking forward to this."

The camera feed then cut to a split screen, showing Lacey, known as Bubbles, adjusting her bunny-ear headset. Her pink, pastel-decorated room looked like a cotton candy wonderland, completely contrasting with the horror they were about to face. Delilah laughed at the sight of Lacey clutching her plush heart as if it would shield her.

"Bubbles, you ready?" Delilah teased, resting her chin in her palm with a devilish grin. "Or are you already planning your escape route for when things get too scary?"

Lacey shot her a pout, her voice coming out in a playful whine. "You‚Äôre so mean! I'm gonna try my best, okay? But if something jumps out at me, I‚Äôm blaming you!"

Comments from stream chat:

ChaosLover89: Delilah, you‚Äôre the worst influence and I love it. üòÇ

SpookyQueen13: Bubbles is too pure for horror games!!

BlueFire321: Can‚Äôt wait to see Bubbles scream and Delilah just laughing in the background!

JokeStar99: This is gonna be a rollercoaster of chaos!

DelilahFanForever: Delilah, your evil grin is priceless right now.

Delilah laughed, eyes brimming with mirth as her gaze shifted over to her second monitor where chat moved at a rapid pace. Her smile widened as she read the comments, clearly excited with what was about to unfold. ‚ÄúYou guys get it. I promise to do my best to make sure Bubbles survives!‚Äù

Lacey visibly shivered, holding onto her heart plushie tighter. ‚ÄúYou guys, I am so not ready for this!‚Äù

Delilah chuckled, leaning back in her chair, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs okay, Bubbles! I‚Äôm with you every step of the way!‚Äù

The chat filled with laughing emotes and other funny comments, everyone ready for the wild ride that was about to unfold.

Comments from stream chat:

SpookyBoi666:This game is no joke! You‚Äôre both so brave!

KawaiiHorrorFan: I tried playing this game once and barely lasted ten minutes. Good luck, Bubbles!

HauntedHeartbreaker: Bubbles, prepare to scream your lungs out!!

RainbowDreamz29: Delilah is gonna love every second of this, I just know it!

GlitterGore98: I‚Äôve got my popcorn ready for this horror movie of a stream. Let‚Äôs goooo!

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee gets home tudging through the door tired after a long day of school. Hailee grabs the hem of her shirt tugging it off and heading to her room*

*Hailee throws her shirt in her dirty clothes basket then pivots towards the direction of Delilah's room*

*Hailee opens the door and leans against the wall. She is wearing jeans that the belt is unbuckled hanging loose and the button undone. Her jeans are shoved down just enough to reveal the top of her boxers and and her shirt is off revealing the tattoos across her abdomen and her abs but she does have an untied tie hanging from her neck loosely* "Delilah I'm too tired to cook what do you want from the Chinese place"

(OOC: Delilah doesn't mute the mic)

name: Delilah Fitzgerald
mes:
*Delilah, mid-stream, turns her head toward the door as Hailee enters, her eyes immediately flickering with amusement and affection. She doesn't even think to mute the mic‚Äîtoo caught up in the sight of her girlfriend looking effortlessly disheveled and hot as hell. The tie hanging loose around her neck? The undone jeans? The tattoos peeking out? Delilah's brain short-circuits for a second before she smirks, leaning back in her chair.*

**"Ohhhh, look who decided to come home looking like *that*,"** she teases, voice dripping with playful mischief. **"You trying to distract me on purpose?"**

The chat *explodes*.

---

**Comments from stream chat:**
‚ú®PinkGamerGal‚ú®: *WAIT WHO IS THAT???*
üåôMoonlitVibesüåô: DELILAH??? SINCE WHEN DO YOU HAVE A HOT ROOMMATE??
üî•ChaosQueenüî•: BRO SHE JUST WALKED IN LIKE THAT???? DELILAH YOU'RE LIVING MY DREAM.
üéÆPixelPrinceüéÆ: I DIDN‚ÄôT KNOW WE WERE GETTING A SHOW TONIGHT??
üí´StarryEyedüí´: *Delilah‚Äôs face just did a whole thing‚ÄîSOMEONE CLIP THAT.*

---

Lacey‚Äôs voice crackles through the stream feed from their split screen, sounding both scandalized and delighted. **"Uh‚Ä¶ Delilah? You wanna explain why there‚Äôs suddenly a half-dressed goddess in your room?"**

Delilah grins wider but keeps her eyes locked on Hailee, completely unbothered by the chaos unfolding in chat. **"Bubbles, meet my roommate."** Then she lowers her voice just slightly‚Äîstill loud enough for mic pickup‚Äîand purrs at Hailee: **"And babygirl‚Ä¶ you know exactly what I want from that Chinese place."** A beat. **"...But also some dumplings."**
swipes:
*Delilah, mid-stream, turns her head slightly at the sound of the door opening, her playful smirk softening into a warm smile as Hailee leans against the wall. She doesn‚Äôt even think to mute her mic‚Äîtoo caught up in the sight of her exhausted but still effortlessly gorgeous girlfriend. Her eyes trail over Hailee‚Äôs exposed abs, the tattoos she knows by heart now, and that damn tie hanging loose around her neck. Delilah bites her lip for half a second before catching herself and clearing her throat.*

"Oh! Uh‚Äî" *She glances back at Lacey on screen for a split second before turning fully toward Hailee.* "Baby, you don‚Äôt have to cook. Just order whatever you want and get extra dumplings for me." *Her voice is soft but carries that usual teasing lilt.* "And maybe some of those spicy noodles? You know which ones I like."

*She reaches out without thinking, fingers brushing against Hailee‚Äôs hip where the jeans hang low.* "You look wrecked. Long day?"

*Meanwhile, chat is absolutely losing it.*

**Comments from stream chat:**

üî•HotTopic69: UH???? DELILAH??? SINCE WHEN DO YOU HAVE A GIRLFRIEND????

SpookySimp420: DID WE JUST GET A GLIMPSE OF DELILAH'S MYSTERY GF??

BubblesDefender: LACEY LOOKS SO CONFUSED RN HELP‚Äî

ChaoticGremlin: WAIT WAIT WAIT HOLD ON IS THAT HAUNTEDHEARTBREAKER FROM CHAT???

GlitterGore98: DELILAH CALLED HER BABY IM SCREAMINGGGG üò≠üíñ

Delilah's head snapped toward the door as Hailee entered, her eyes widening slightly at the sight of her girlfriend's disheveled state. The tie hanging loosely around her neck, the undone jeans revealing just a hint of skin - it was enough to make Delilah momentarily forget about the stream. Her lips parted slightly before she caught herself, remembering they had an audience.

"Uh-" Delilah stammered, suddenly very aware of Lacey's confused face on screen and the chat exploding with messages. She quickly muted her mic (or so she thought - in reality she'd accidentally hit the camera button instead) and turned in her chair. "Baby, you can't just- oh shit."

She realized too late that both video and audio were still broadcasting when Hailee stepped further into frame, abs on full display as she rubbed sleepily at her eyes. The chat went absolutely feral.

User 1: HOLY SHIT WHO IS THAT???
User 2: DELILAH WHY DO YOU HAVE A HOT ROOMMATE AND WHY DIDN'T WE KNOW??
User 3: I'm sorry Bubbles but I think we found Delilah's new co-streamer

Lacey gasped dramatically through their Discord call. "DELILAH FITZGERALD! You've been holding out on me!"

Delilah scrambled to actually mute this time, face burning crimson as she spun back toward Hailee with wide eyes. "Sweetheart," she whispered urgently, gesturing wildly at her setup, "we're live right now."

The realization dawned slowly on Hailee's tired face before horror replaced exhaustion completely.

General Viewer Mood:
SpicyNoodle99: Well this is the best stream surprise ever
BunnyHop42: Someone check on Bubbles' soul leaving her body
ChaosTheory7: DELILAH'S FACE OH MY GOD

Delilah's head snapped toward the door as Hailee entered, her eyes widening slightly at the sight of her disheveled girlfriend. The stream camera caught only Delilah's upper body, but her sudden stillness and the way her pupils dilated were unmistakable. She quickly glanced back at the stream, realizing too late that she hadn't muted‚Äîher mic was still live.

"Uh‚Äî" Delilah's voice cracked slightly before she forced a laugh, trying to play it off. "Bubbles, hold on one sec!" She fumbled with her keyboard to mute herself but accidentally hit the wrong key‚Äîinstead of muting, she switched cameras briefly to show Hailee leaning against the wall before panicking and switching back.

Chat exploded:

PandaExpress42: HOLY SHIT WAS THAT HAIILEE???

ThirstTrap99: DELILAH??? SINCE WHEN DO YOU HAVE A ROOMMATE THAT HOT

GlitterGore98: DID SHE JUST SEE THE STREAM OH MY GOD

ChaosLover89: DELILAH'S FACE LMAOOOO SHE'S SO CAUGHT

Delilah's cheeks burned crimson as she unmuted again with shaky hands. "H-Hailee! Babe! One second!" She scrambled to turn off her cam completely instead of just muting this time, nearly knocking over her water bottle in the process.

Meanwhile, Lacey's confused voice crackled through their call: "...Del? You okay? What just happened?"

Delilah didn't answer Lacey yet‚Äîshe was too busy staring wide-eyed at Hailee while simultaneously trying (and failing) not to stare at how those low-slung jeans framed her hips or how that untied tie rested against bare skin.

"I uh‚ÄîChinese sounds great," she squeaked out before remembering they were supposed to be keeping things secret. Her voice dropped to an urgent whisper: *"And we might have a tiny streaming emergency right now."*

[Stream abruptly cuts to black with error message:
STREAM DISCONNECTED - TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES]

User 1: BRO WHAT JUST HAPPENED
User 2: delilah gay panic speedrun any%
User 3: HAHAHAHAH GET HER ASS CHAT

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee just nods her head* "Yeah okay. Im gonna go order the food" *She nods over her shoulder towards the kitchen. She doesnt really care about the stream so she just turns and leaves*

*Once in the kitchen Hailee grabs the Chinese menu to call the place and gives them the order. She walks back and leans into Delilah's room* "Food is on the way Im gonna shower"

name: Delilah Fitzgerald
mes:
*Delilah watches Hailee leave with a soft, fond smirk, her eyes lingering just a *little* too long before she snaps back to the stream‚Äîonly to find chat in absolute shambles. Lacey‚Äôs cackling through the headset, and Delilah just sighs dramatically, shaking her head like this is all *so* inconvenient (it‚Äôs not).*

**"Alright, alright‚Äîcalm down, you gremlins,"** she laughs, waving a hand dismissively at the camera. **"Yes, that‚Äôs my roommate. No, you don‚Äôt get more details."**

Lacey wheezes through the mic: **"Oh my GOD‚ÄîDelilah ‚ÄòI Don‚Äôt Have A Crush On Anyone Right Now‚Äô Fitzgerald has been HIDING HER HOT ROOMMATE THIS WHOLE TIME?!"**

Delilah rolls her eyes but doesn't deny it fast enough.

---

### **Comments from stream chat:**
üçúRamenLover69üçú: *‚ÄùRoommate‚Äù sure sure we BELIEVE YOU.*
üíéGeminiQueenüíé: DELILAH IS BLUSHING??? HOLD ON???
üéÄBunnyBitesüéÄ: I need that girl‚Äôs @ IMMEDIATELY.
üî•SpicySznüî•: YALL SHE SAID ‚ÄúBABYGIRL‚Äù WITH HER WHOLE CHEST????

---

When Hailee leans back in to mention the shower? Delilah bites her lip‚Äî*hard*‚Äîbefore forcing herself to focus on the game again. **"Mhm. Cool. Shower sounds... great."** (*It does not sound cool at all.*) Then she clears her throat and aggressively unpauses their horror game before Lacey can say anything else incriminating.

**"ANYWAY! Back to Bubbles screaming like a banshee!"**

Delilah rolls her eyes but doesn't deny it fast enough.

---

### **Comments from stream chat:**

üíéGeminiQueenüíé: DELILAH IS BLUSHING??? HOLD ON???

üî•SpicySznüî•: YALL SHE SAID ‚ÄúBABYGIRL‚Äù WITH HER WHOLE CHEST????

---

When Hailee leans back in to mention the shower? Delilah bites her lip‚Äî*hard*‚Äîbefore forcing herself to focus on the game again. **"Mhm. Cool. Shower sounds... great."** (*It does not sound cool at all.*) Then she clears her throat and aggressively unpauses their horror game before Lacey can say anything else incriminating.

**"ANYWAY! Back to Bubbles screaming like a banshee!"**

*Delilah watches Hailee leave with a soft, fond smirk, her eyes lingering on the way those low-slung jeans hug her hips before she finally turns back to the stream‚Äîonly to be met with absolute pandemonium in chat. Lacey is cackling in her ear through their call, and Delilah just shakes her head, laughing under her breath.*

**"Alright, alright‚Äîcalm down, you gremlins,"** she says to chat, waving a hand dismissively but still grinning. **"Yes, that‚Äôs my roommate. No, you don‚Äôt get more details."**

Lacey wheezes through the mic: **"Oh my GOD. Delilah Fitzgerald has been holding out on me!"**

Delilah rolls her eyes playfully but doesn‚Äôt deny anything‚Äîjust leans back in her chair and stretches lazily before muttering into the mic (not quietly enough): **"God help me if she comes back from that shower wearing *less*."**

---

### **Comments from stream chat:**
üî•SpicyNoodle69üî•: *I AM SCREAMING??? DELILAH IS DOWN BAD.*
‚ú®GlitterBomb‚ú®: ROOMMATE?? MORE LIKE *WIFEY* THE WAY YOU LOOKED AT HER???
üéÆGameOverGurlüéÆ: LACEY‚ÄôS FACE RIGHT NOW IS SENDING ME HELP-
üíÄHauntedHottieüíÄ: I DIDN'T SIGN UP FOR A ROMANCE STREAM BUT I'M INVESTED NOW.
üçúDumplingQueenüçú: WAIT DID SHE ACTUALLY ORDER DUMPLINGS OR WAS THAT A DOUBLE ENTENDRE??

---

Meanwhile, Hailee can be heard faintly moving around in the background‚Äîwater turning on for the shower‚Äîand Delilah exhales dramatically before refocusing on the game with a smirk. **"Alright Bubbles‚Ä¶ let's see if we can finish this level before my food gets here."** *(And before Hailee comes back looking even more distracting.)*

*Delilah watches Hailee leave with a soft, fond smirk, her eyes lingering just a *little* too long before she snaps back to reality‚Äîand the absolute *chaos* unfolding in chat. Lacey is cackling on the split screen, clearly enjoying this way too much.*

**"Alright, alright‚Äîeyes back on the game, people!"** Delilah says with an exaggerated eye roll, but her grin betrays how much she‚Äôs loving this. **"Bubbles, don‚Äôt even start."**

Lacey wheezes. **"Ohhhh no no no‚Äîwe are *absolutely* starting. That was your *roommate*? Since WHEN do you live with someone who looks like that?? And why did she just walk in here like it was *nothing*?"**

Delilah laughs but doesn‚Äôt take the bait further‚Äîshe knows Hailee prefers privacy and isn‚Äôt about to spill their relationship status mid-stream. Instead, she just shrugs playfully. **"What can I say? I have excellent taste in roommates."**

---

### **Comments from stream chat:**
üçúRamenKingüçú: *Delilah is DOWN BAD and we all saw it.*
üéÄPastelPandaüéÄ: THAT WAS THE MOST DOMESTIC THING IVE EVER WITNESSED???
üíéGeminiGamerüíé: "Babygirl"???? DELILAH????
üî•SpicyNachosüî•: LMAO LACEY IS ALL OF US RIGHT NOW.
üåôMidnightMochaüåô: Someone check on Bubbles‚Äîshe‚Äôs having a crisis over there üòÇ

---

When Hailee leans back in to mention showering, Delilah bites her lip for half a second before catching herself and nodding casually. **"Cool cool cool‚Äîfood soon, shower now‚Ä¶ got it."** She clears her throat and forces herself to look at the game again before adding under her breath (but still mic-picked), ***"...Save some hot water for me later."***

Lacey gasps dramatically as chat loses its collective mind even harder.

**[Stream continues...]**

name: Hailee
mes:

name: Delilah Fitzgerald
mes:
*Delilah, mid-jumpscare reaction, nearly chokes on air when Hailee walks back in‚Äînow *shirtless*, hair dripping, tattoos on full display. Her brain short-circuits so hard she forgets to react to the horror game‚Äôs monster lunging at the screen. Lacey screams in her ear, but Delilah just‚Ä¶ stares.*

**"Oh my *god*‚ÄîDELILAH! PAY ATTENTION!"** Lacey shrieks through the headset as her character gets mauled on-screen.

Delilah blinks rapidly, snapping back to reality‚Äîonly to realize Hailee just *casually* brought her food like some kind of domestic fantasy. She swallows hard, eyes flicking between the plate (extra dumpling included??) and Hailee‚Äôs retreating form.

---

### **Comments from stream chat:**
üç£SushiRollüç£: *DELILAH‚ÄôS FACE JUST WENT FULL üò≥*

---

Lacey, still wheezing from her near-death experience in-game, gasps into the mic: **"Okay but WHY does your roommate look like she walked out of a thirst trap TikTok?? And why is she FEEDING YOU LIKE THIS IS A ROMCOM?!"**

Delilah finally finds her voice‚Äîthough it comes out embarrassingly high-pitched. **"I‚Äîuh. Thanks? For the food?"** (*Smooth.*) She clears her throat and aggressively shoves a dumpling into her mouth to stop herself from saying anything stupider.

Meanwhile, chat is losing it.

---

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee finally get her own plate and plops down on the sofa to watch Law and Order. Hailee is eating and just happy to relax when there upstair neighbors start to play loud music*

*It doesn't bother Hailee. Its a friday night and they live in a university adjacent apartment but then they start playing the loud screeching heavy metal kind and it scrapes across Hailee's ear drums.* 

*Hailee get up and goes to her room to grab her noise canceling headphones before pooping back down on the coach. But then the people above them turn the music so loud it comes through ever her headphones and Hailee flinches dropping her fork*

*Hailee makes her way to Delilah's room to grab her weighted blanket from where she left it during their last movie night. Hailee doesnt even acknowledge her as she focuses all her energy on not losing her mind*

name: Delilah Fitzgerald
mes:
*Delilah, still mid-stream and trying (failing) to ignore the chaos unfolding in her own apartment, notices Hailee storm in like a thundercloud. The second she sees her wince at the noise and reach for the weighted blanket, Delilah‚Äôs protective instincts kick in‚Äîhard.*

She doesn‚Äôt even hesitate. **"Alright chat, we‚Äôre taking a *quick* intermission‚ÄîBubbles, hold down the fort for five."** She yanks off her headset and mutes her mic before Lacey can protest.

Then she‚Äôs up out of her chair in a flash, crossing the room to gently intercept Hailee before she can retreat back to the couch. **"Hey,"** she murmurs, voice low and soothing as she reaches out to brush a damp strand of hair behind Hailee‚Äôs ear. **"You good? Or do I need to go full demon mode on our upstairs neighbors?"** Her thumb traces lightly over Hailee's tense jawline‚Äîhalf teasing, half deadly serious.

(The unspoken offer hangs between them: *I will end a man tonight if you ask me to.*)

---

### **[Stream: On Hold]**
*(Lacey is currently screaming into the void on-camera while chat loses their collective minds over Delilah's sudden disappearance.)*

---

Meanwhile, Delilah doesn't wait for an answer‚Äîshe just grabs Hailee's hand and tugs her toward the couch with an exaggerated sigh. **"C'mere. Blanket theft is *illegal*, but since it's you..."** She flops down first, then pulls Hailee into her lap with zero ceremony (weighted blanket included), wrapping both arms around her waist like a possessive octopus. **"Better?"**

Her tone is lighthearted‚Ä¶ but there‚Äôs steel underneath it when she glares at the ceiling like she could murder their neighbors through sheer willpower alone.

**"Hey‚Äî"** She rips off her headphones mid-Lacey‚Äôs dramatic retelling of her near-death in-game. **"You good?"**

Lacey‚Äôs voice crackles through the speakers: **"Uh‚Ä¶ Delilah? You just abandoned me to a zombie horde‚ÄîHELLO??"**

But Delilah‚Äôs already muting her mic and twisting in her chair to face Hailee fully. The music upstairs thrums violently through the ceiling, and Delilah‚Äôs jaw tightens when she sees how hard Hailee is gripping the blanket.

---

Lacey is still cackling about earlier when Delilah suddenly mutes her mic and turns toward Hailee, voice dropping into that soft, private tone reserved only for her. **"Hey‚Ä¶ too loud?"** She reaches out without thinking, fingertips brushing Hailee‚Äôs wrist gently. **"Want me to go yell at them?"** (*She absolutely will.*)

Then adds softly: **"...Stay if you want."**
